Hebrew: חֲז֖וֹן עֹֽבַדְיָ֑ה כֹּֽה־אָמַר֩ אֲדֹנָ֨י יֱהֹוִ֜ה לֶאֱד֗וֹם שְׁמוּעָ֨ה שָׁמַ֜עְנוּ מֵאֵ֤ת יְהֹוָה֙ וְצִיר֙ בַּגּוֹיִ֣ם שֻׁלָּ֔ח ק֛וּמוּ וְנָק֥וּמָה עָלֶ֖יהָ לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃
Translated:
The prophecy of Obadiah.
We have received tidings from GOD,
And an envoy has been sent out among the nations:
“Up! Let us rise up against her for battle.”
Thus said the Sovereign GOD concerning Edom:
Transliteration: chazvon ovadeyah khoh-amar adonay yehovih leedvom shemuah shamaenu meet yehovah vetsiyr vagvoyim shulach kumu venakumah aleyha lamilechamah

Hebrew: הִנֵּ֥ה קָטֹ֛ן נְתַתִּ֖יךָ בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם בָּז֥וּי אַתָּ֖ה מְאֹֽד׃
Translated:
I will make you least among nations,
You shall be most despised.
Transliteration: hineh katon netatiykha vagvoyim vazuy atah meod

Hebrew: זְד֤וֹן לִבְּךָ֙ הִשִּׁיאֶ֔ךָ שֹׁכְנִ֥י בְחַגְוֵי־סֶ֖לַע מְר֣וֹם שִׁבְתּ֑וֹ אֹמֵ֣ר בְּלִבּ֔וֹ מִ֥י יוֹרִדֵ֖נִי אָֽרֶץ׃
Translated:
Your arrogant heart has seduced you,
You who dwell in clefts of the rock,
In your lofty abode.
You think in your heart,
“Who can pull me down to earth?”
Transliteration: zedvon livekha hishiyekha shokheniy vechagevey-sela mervom shivetvo omer velivvo miy yvorideniy arets

Hebrew: אִם־תַּגְבִּ֣יהַּ כַּנֶּ֔שֶׁר וְאִם־בֵּ֥ין כּֽוֹכָבִ֖ים שִׂ֣ים קִנֶּ֑ךָ מִשָּׁ֥ם אוֹרִֽידְךָ֖ נְאֻם־יְהֹוָֽה׃
Translated:
Should you nest as high as the eagle,
Should your eyrie be lodged ’mong the stars,
Even from there I will pull you down
—declares GOD.
Transliteration: im-tageviyha khanesher veim-veyn khvokhaviym shiym kinekha misham voriydekha neum-yehovah

Hebrew: אִם־גַּנָּבִ֤ים בָּאֽוּ־לְךָ֙ אִם־שׁ֣וֹדְדֵי לַ֔יְלָה אֵ֣יךְ נִדְמֵ֔יתָה הֲל֥וֹא יִגְנְב֖וּ דַּיָּ֑ם אִם־בֹּֽצְרִים֙ בָּ֣אוּ לָ֔ךְ הֲל֖וֹא יַשְׁאִ֥ירוּ עֹלֵלֽוֹת׃
Translated:
If thieves were to come to you,
Marauders by night,
They would steal no more than they needed.
If vintagers came to you,
They would surely leave some gleanings.
How utterly you are destroyed!
Transliteration: im-ganaviym vau-lekha im-shvodedey layelah eykhe nidemeytah halvo yigenevu dayam im-votseriym vau lakhe halvo yasheiyru olelvot

Hebrew: אֵ֚יךְ נֶחְפְּשׂ֣וּ עֵשָׂ֔ו נִבְע֖וּ מַצְפֻּנָֽיו׃
Translated:
How thoroughly rifled is Esau,
How ransacked his hoards!
Transliteration: eykhe nechefeshu eshav niveu matsefunayv

Hebrew: עַֽד־הַגְּב֣וּל שִׁלְּח֗וּךָ כֹּ֚ל אַנְשֵׁ֣י בְרִיתֶ֔ךָ הִשִּׁיא֛וּךָ יָכְל֥וּ לְךָ֖ אַנְשֵׁ֣י שְׁלֹמֶ֑ךָ לַחְמְךָ֗ יָשִׂ֤ימוּ מָזוֹר֙ תַּחְתֶּ֔יךָ אֵ֥ין תְּבוּנָ֖ה בּֽוֹ׃
Translated:
All your allies turned you back
At the frontier;
Your own confederates
Have duped and overcome you;
[Those who ate] your bread
Have planted snares under you.
He is bereft of understanding.
Transliteration: ad-hagevul shilechukha khol aneshey veriytekha hishiyukha yakhelu lekha aneshey shelomekha lachemekha yashiymu mazvor tacheteykha eyn tevunah vvo

Hebrew: הֲל֛וֹא בַּיּ֥וֹם הַה֖וּא נְאֻם־יְהֹוָ֑ה וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֤י חֲכָמִים֙ מֵֽאֱד֔וֹם וּתְבוּנָ֖ה מֵהַ֥ר עֵשָֽׂו׃
Translated:
In that day
—declares GOD—
I will make the wise vanish from Edom,
Understanding from Esau’s mount.
Transliteration: halvo vayyvom hahu neum-yehovah vehaavadetiy chakhamiym meedvom utevunah mehar eshav

Hebrew: וְחַתּ֥וּ גִבּוֹרֶ֖יךָ תֵּימָ֑ן לְמַ֧עַן יִכָּֽרֶת־אִ֛ישׁ מֵהַ֥ר עֵשָׂ֖ו מִקָּֽטֶל׃
Translated:
Your warriors shall lose heart, O Teman,
And no one on Esau’s mount
Shall survive the slaughter.
Transliteration: vechatu givvoreykha teyman lemaan yikharet-iysh mehar eshav mikatel

Hebrew: מֵחֲמַ֛ס אָחִ֥יךָ יַעֲקֹ֖ב תְּכַסְּךָ֣ בוּשָׁ֑ה וְנִכְרַ֖תָּ לְעוֹלָֽם׃
Translated:
For the outrage to your brother Jacob,
Disgrace shall engulf you,
And you shall perish forever.
Transliteration: mechamas achiykha yaakov tekhasekha vushah venikherata levolam

Hebrew: בְּיוֹם֙ עֲמׇֽדְךָ֣ מִנֶּ֔גֶד בְּי֛וֹם שְׁב֥וֹת זָרִ֖ים חֵיל֑וֹ וְנׇכְרִ֞ים בָּ֣אוּ שְׁעָרָ֗ו וְעַל־יְרוּשָׁלַ֙͏ִם֙ יַדּ֣וּ גוֹרָ֔ל גַּם־אַתָּ֖ה כְּאַחַ֥ד מֵהֶֽם׃
Translated:
On that day when you stood aloof,
When aliens carried off his goods,
When foreigners entered his gates
And cast lots for Jerusalem,
You were as one of them.
Transliteration: veyvom amׇdekha mineged veyvom shevvot zariym cheylvo venׇkheriym vau shearav veal-yerushala͏im yadu gvoral gam-atah kheachad mehem

Hebrew: וְאַל־תֵּ֤רֶא בְיוֹם־אָחִ֙יךָ֙ בְּי֣וֹם נׇכְר֔וֹ וְאַל־תִּשְׂמַ֥ח לִבְנֵֽי־יְהוּדָ֖ה בְּי֣וֹם אׇבְדָ֑ם וְאַל־תַּגְדֵּ֥ל פִּ֖יךָ בְּי֥וֹם צָרָֽה׃
Translated:
How could you gaze with glee
On your brother that day,
On his day of calamity!
How could you gloat
Over the people of Judah
On that day of ruin!
How could you loudly jeer
On a day of anguish!
Transliteration: veal-tere veyvom-achiykha veyvom nׇkhervo veal-tishemach liveney-yehudah veyvom ׇvedam veal-tagedel fiykha veyvom tsarah

Hebrew: אַל־תָּב֤וֹא בְשַֽׁעַר־עַמִּי֙ בְּי֣וֹם אֵידָ֔ם אַל־תֵּ֧רֶא גַם־אַתָּ֛ה בְּרָעָת֖וֹ בְּי֣וֹם אֵיד֑וֹ וְאַל־תִּשְׁלַ֥חְנָה בְחֵיל֖וֹ בְּי֥וֹם אֵידֽוֹ׃
Translated:
How could you enter the gate of My people
On its day of disaster,
Gaze in glee with the others
On its misfortune
On its day of disaster,
And lay hands on its wealth
On its day of disaster!
Transliteration: al-tavvo veshaar-amiy veyvom eydam al-tere gam-atah veraatvo veyvom eydvo veal-tishelachenah vecheylvo veyvom eydvo

Hebrew: וְאַֽל־תַּעֲמֹד֙ עַל־הַפֶּ֔רֶק לְהַכְרִ֖ית אֶת־פְּלִיטָ֑יו וְאַל־תַּסְגֵּ֥ר שְׂרִידָ֖יו בְּי֥וֹם צָרָֽה׃
Translated:
How could you stand at the passes
To cut down its fugitives!
How could you betray those who fled
On that day of anguish!
Transliteration: veal-taamod al-haferek lehakheriyt et-feliytayv veal-taseger sheriydayv veyvom tsarah

Hebrew: כִּֽי־קָר֥וֹב יוֹם־יְהֹוָ֖ה עַל־כׇּל־הַגּוֹיִ֑ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר עָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ יֵעָ֣שֶׂה לָּ֔ךְ גְּמֻלְךָ֖ יָשׁ֥וּב בְּרֹאשֶֽׁךָ׃
Translated:
As you did, so shall it be done to you;
Your conduct shall be requited.
Yea, against all nations
The day of GOD is at hand.
Transliteration: khiy-karvov yvom-yehovah al-khׇl-hagvoyim khaasher ashiyta eiasheh lakhe gemulekha yashuv veroshekha

Hebrew: כִּ֗י כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֤ר שְׁתִיתֶם֙ עַל־הַ֣ר קׇדְשִׁ֔י יִשְׁתּ֥וּ כׇֽל־הַגּוֹיִ֖ם תָּמִ֑יד וְשָׁת֣וּ וְלָע֔וּ וְהָי֖וּ כְּל֥וֹא הָיֽוּ׃
Translated:
That same cup that you drank on My Holy Mount
Shall all nations drink evermore,
Drink till their speech grows thick,
And they become as though they had never been.
Transliteration: khiy khaasher shetiytem al-har kׇdeshiy yishetu khׇl-hagvoyim tamiyd veshatu velau vehayu khelvo hayu

Hebrew: וּבְהַ֥ר צִיּ֛וֹן תִּהְיֶ֥ה פְלֵיטָ֖ה וְהָ֣יָה קֹ֑דֶשׁ וְיָֽרְשׁוּ֙ בֵּ֣ית יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב אֵ֖ת מוֹרָֽשֵׁיהֶֽם׃
Translated:
But on Zion’s mount a remnant shall survive,
And it shall be holy.
The House of Jacob shall dispossess
Those who dispossessed them.
Transliteration: uvehar tsiyyvon tiheyeh feleytah vehayah kodesh veyareshu veyt yaakov et mvorasheyhem

Hebrew: וְהָיָה֩ בֵית־יַעֲקֹ֨ב אֵ֜שׁ וּבֵ֧ית יוֹסֵ֣ף לֶהָבָ֗ה וּבֵ֤ית עֵשָׂו֙ לְקַ֔שׁ וְדָלְק֥וּ בָהֶ֖ם וַאֲכָל֑וּם וְלֹֽא־יִֽהְיֶ֤ה שָׂרִיד֙ לְבֵ֣ית עֵשָׂ֔ו כִּ֥י יְהֹוָ֖ה דִּבֵּֽר׃
Translated:
The House of Jacob shall be fire,
And the House of Joseph flame,
And the House of Esau shall be straw;
They shall burn it and devour it,
And no survivor shall be left of the House of Esau
—for GOD has spoken.
Transliteration: vehayah veyt-yaakov esh uveyt yvosef lehavah uveyt eshav lekash vedaleku vahem vaakhalum velo-yiheyeh shariyd leveyt eshav khiy yehovah diver

Hebrew: וְיָרְשׁ֨וּ הַנֶּ֜גֶב אֶת־הַ֣ר עֵשָׂ֗ו וְהַשְּׁפֵלָה֙ אֶת־פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים וְיָרְשׁוּ֙ אֶת־שְׂדֵ֣ה אֶפְרַ֔יִם וְאֵ֖ת שְׂדֵ֣ה שֹׁמְר֑וֹן וּבִנְיָמִ֖ן אֶת־הַגִּלְעָֽד׃
Translated: Thus they shall possess the Negeb and Mount Esau as well, the Shephelah and Philistia. They shall possess the Ephraimite country and the district of Samaria, and Benjamin along with Gilead.
Transliteration: veyareshu hanegev et-har eshav vehashefelah et-felishetiym veyareshu et-shedeh eferayiim veet shedeh shomervon uvineyamin et-hagilead

Hebrew: וְגָלֻ֣ת הַֽחֵל־הַ֠זֶּ֠ה לִבְנֵ֨י יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל אֲשֶֽׁר־כְּנַעֲנִים֙ עַד־צָ֣רְפַ֔ת וְגָלֻ֥ת יְרוּשָׁלַ֖͏ִם אֲשֶׁ֣ר בִּסְפָרַ֑ד יִֽרְשׁ֕וּ אֵ֖ת עָרֵ֥י הַנֶּֽגֶב׃
Translated: And that exiled force of Israelites [shall possess] what belongs to the Phoenicians as far as Zarephath, while the Jerusalemite exile community of Sepharad shall possess the towns of the Negeb.
Transliteration: vegalut hachel-hazeh liveney yisherael asher-khenaaniym ad-tsarefat vegalut yerushala͏im asher visefarad yireshu et arey hanegev

Hebrew: וְעָל֤וּ מֽוֹשִׁעִים֙ בְּהַ֣ר צִיּ֔וֹן לִשְׁפֹּ֖ט אֶת־הַ֣ר עֵשָׂ֑ו וְהָיְתָ֥ה לַֽיהֹוָ֖ה הַמְּלוּכָֽה׃
Translated: For liberators shall march up on Mount Zion to wreak judgment on Mount Esau; and dominion shall be G<small>OD</small>’s.
Transliteration: vealu mvoshiiym vehar tsiyyvon lishefot et-har eshav vehayetah layhovah hamelukhah
